Summary: Saw an orange red like light that fluttered through the sky
trends: There have been 42 other sightings in Lincoln
There were no other sightings in Lincoln on or around July 20th 2013
divs: sighting detailsmy husband and i were out on the balcony and in the south of the sky we noticed a faint orange red like light that was floating through he sky. we thought it was a helicopter but moved south east quicker and closer to our area. it looked as if it was going up further into the sky\clouds. it kept going south east and further up and then disappeared. it kinda freaked us out as it didn't look like a plane or helicopter, and during this time our baby woke up like never before - just a screaming cry like a scarred cry. not typical and not sure if it is just a coincidence but was weird and when the light disappeared the baby was fine. wouldn't go back to bed but he stopped crying!
